metadata.name: Potential Persistence Via Outlook Form
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a new Outlook form which can contain malicious code

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\outlook.exe')) AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\microsoft\\forms\\ipm')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\local settings\\application data\\microsoft\\forms'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a new Outlook form which can contain malicious code

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of outlook forms References: https://speakerdeck.com/heirhabarov/hunting-for-persistence-via-microsoft-exchange-server-or-outlook?slide=76, https://speakerdeck.com/heirhabarov/hunting-for-persistence-via-microsoft-exchange-server-or-outlook?slide=79, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/office/vba/outlook/concepts/outlook-forms/create-an-outlook-form, https://www.slipstick.com/developer/custom-form/clean-outlooks-forms-cache/
